meanings.definition: A farewell or parting ceremony or gesture.
meanings.sent1: At the end of the party, we gave warm sendoffs to all our guests.
meanings.sent2: The sendoffs at the train station were filled with tears and hugs.
meanings.sent3: The sendoffs at the airport turned into a dance party!
meanings.sent4: Her sendoff was like a symphony of emotions, each note a goodbye.
meanings.sent5: The sendoffs were like colorful balloons floating away, carrying our best wishes.

meanings.sent1: The quick sendoffs of the packages ensured timely delivery.
meanings.sent2: The sendoffs of the letters were done efficiently by the postal workers.
meanings.sent3: The sendoffs of the emails were like little messengers flying away.
meanings.sent4: The sendoffs of the goods from the warehouse were like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The sendoffs of the invitations were swift and precise, just like clockwork.

meanings.definition: A demonstration of good wishes for a person starting on a journey or new venture.
meanings.sent1: The heartfelt sendoffs from her friends made her feel supported.
meanings.sent2: The sendoffs from the team boosted his confidence before the competition.
meanings.sent3: The sendoffs from the crowd were so loud, they could be heard for miles!
meanings.sent4: The sendoffs from the community were like a warm blanket on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The sendoffs from her family were a beacon of light guiding her forward.
